course.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
course.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar with this comprehensive beginner course. Perfect for those with no prior experience.

course.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
course.description: Take your piano skills to the next level with advanced techniques and exercises designed for experienced players.

course.title: Jazz Improvisation Masterclass
course.description: Master the art of jazz improvisation with this in-depth course, featuring lessons from top jazz musicians.

course.title: Music Production for Beginners
course.description: Learn the fundamentals of music production, including mixing, mastering, and using digital audio workstations.

course.title: Classical Violin Techniques
course.description: Explore classical violin techniques and improve your playing with lessons from renowned violinists.
